get.summary: List all canvases from a user.

parameters.name: pagination.pageKey
parameters.description:
Instead of an offset an abstract  "page" key is provided that offers
an opaque "pointer" into some offset in a result set.

parameters.name: pagination.pageOffset
parameters.description:
If a pagekey is not supported we can also support a direct integer offset
for cases where it makes sense.

post.summary: Reset a canvas - clears all state, generators, and metrics

get.summary: Get the system diagram for visualization
Evaluate system flows using specified strategy
Execute breadth-first traversal to find all possible execution paths
Execute a single trace for debugging/analysis

post.summary: Adds a generator to a canvas's generator_ids list and creates the generator resource.

parameters.name: generator.canvasId
parameters.description: Canvas this generator is sending traffic to

component.title:
Name of the target component to generate traffic on. This component should be defined in the System,
eg "server"

method.description: Method in the target component to generate traffic on.

rate.title: Traffic rate in RPS (>= 1).  Does not support < 1 yet

duration.title: Duration in seconds over which the genarator is run. 0 => For ever

enabled.title: whether it is enabled or not

patch.summary: Use PATCH for partial updates to a generator

parameters.name: generator.canvasId
parameters.description: Canvas this generator is sending traffic to

component.title:
Name of the target component to generate traffic on. This component should be defined in the System,
eg "server"

method.description: Method in the target component to generate traffic on.

rate.title: Traffic rate in RPS (>= 1).  Does not support < 1 yet

duration.title: Duration in seconds over which the genarator is run. 0 => For ever

enabled.title: whether it is enabled or not

get.summary: Get details/stats for a particular canvas

delete.summary: Delete a particular canvas. Frees up resources used by it and all the connections

post.summary: Adds a metric to live plot

component.title:
Name of the target component to monitor
eg "server"

methods.description: Method in the target component to generate traffic on.

enabled.title: whether it is enabled or not

aggregation.title: Type of aggregation on the metric

aggregationWindow.title: Aggregation window (in seconds) to match on

matchResultType.title:
The result "type" if a matching result is provided
This will be parsed into a type declaration so we know how to treat
the match_result value provided

get.summary: GetSystem returns a specific system with metadata
GetSystemContent returns the SDL and recipe content for a system

root.title: The root TraceNode always starts from the <Component>.<Method> where we are kicking off the trace from

v1AllPathsTraceData.title: Enhanced TraceData for all-paths traversal - represents the complete execution tree

loadedFiles.title: Files that have been loaded so far

metrics.title: Registered live metrics for this canvas

order.title: Execution order (supports decimals for conditional paths)

condition.title: Condition expression if this is a conditional path

probability.title: Probability of this path being taken

generatorId.title: ID of the generator that originated this flow

v1DiagramEdge.title: DiagramEdge represents a connection between nodes

v1DiagramNode.title: DiagramNode represents a component or instance in the system

id.title: Unique Edge ID across the entire Trace

nextNode.title: The next node this edge leads to

isAsync.title: Async edges denote Futures being sent without a return

isReverse.title: "Reverse" edges show a "wait" on a future

probability.description: This is optional but leaving it here just in case.

isConditional.title: true if this edge represents a conditional branch

v1Edge.title: Edge represents a transition from one node to another in the execution tree

v1FlowEdge.title: Represents a flow edge between components

canvasId.title: Canvas this generator is sending traffic to

component.title:
Name of the target component to generate traffic on. This component should be defined in the System,
eg "server"

method.description: Method in the target component to generate traffic on.

rate.title: Traffic rate in RPS (>= 1).  Does not support < 1 yet

duration.title: Duration in seconds over which the genarator is run. 0 => For ever

enabled.title: whether it is enabled or not

v1GroupInfo.title: GroupInfo allows flexible grouping of edges with labels

v1MethodInfo.title: MethodInfo represents information about a component method

component.title:
Name of the target component to monitor
eg "server"

methods.description: Method in the target component to generate traffic on.

enabled.title: whether it is enabled or not

aggregation.title: Type of aggregation on the metric

aggregationWindow.title: Aggregation window (in seconds) to match on

matchResultType.title:
The result "type" if a matching result is provided
This will be parsed into a type declaration so we know how to treat
the match_result value provided

pageKey.description:
Instead of an offset an abstract  "page" key is provided that offers
an opaque "pointer" into some offset in a result set.

pageOffset.description:
If a pagekey is not supported we can also support a direct integer offset
for cases where it makes sense.

nextPageKey.description:
The key/pointer string that subsequent List requests should pass to
continue the pagination.

nextPageOffset.title: Also support an integer offset if possible

errorMessage.title: Set if this specific update failed

v1SystemDiagram.title: SystemDiagram represents the topology of a system

v1SystemInfo.title: SystemInfo represents a system in the catalog

v1SystemProject.title: SystemProject represents a full system project

v1SystemVersion.title: SystemVersion represents a version of a system

startingTarget.title: Name of the component and method in the form <Component>.<Method> we are starting the trace from

edges.title: All edges in an ordered fashion

groups.title: Multiple groups for flexible labeling of sub-trees (loops, conditionals, etc.)

v1TraceNode.title: TraceNode represents a single node in the execution tree

isBottleneck.title: Whether this is the bottleneck resource
